mapper.select: select p.* from Sys_User u LEFT JOIN sys_role_user sru on u.id= sru.Sys_User_id LEFT JOIN Sys_Role r on sru.Sys_Role_id=r.id LEFT JOIN Sys_permission_role spr on spr.sys_role_id=r.id LEFT JOIN Sys_permission p on p.id =spr.sys_permission_id where u.id=#{userId}
SELECT c.url,c.method FROM sys_role a INNER JOIN sys_permission_role b ON a.id = b.sys_role_id INNER JOIN sys_permission c ON b.sys_permission_id = c.id WHERE a.`name` = #{auth}
